projects.title: FoodieExpress
projects.description: Full-stack food delivery web application connecting customers, restaurants, and delivery partners with real-time order tracking and comprehensive management systems.
highlights: Multi-role system for customers, restaurant owners, and delivery partners
Real-time order tracking and delivery status monitoring
Comprehensive menu management and sales analytics

projects.title: DeepFake Image Detection
projects.description: Deep learning system for detecting Deepfake images with 99.76% accuracy using SVM classifiers and DenseNets. Processed 140k images and analyzed 6.9M features.
highlights: Comprehensive review of 20 existing detection systems
Advanced frequency domain analysis and data normalization

projects.title: FlashLearn (Flashcard App)
projects.description: Interactive flashcard application built with Python and Kivy, managing up to 150 flashcards with dynamic quiz features across three difficulty levels.
highlights: JSON-based deck upload for seamless management
Dynamic quiz system with adaptive difficulty
